Christian se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es  seguir trabajando y tener dinero para cuando se enferme la abuelita.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Christian Adolfo G. L. is 25 years old.  He is single and lives with his grandmother in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He does not have any children.

The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Christian is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in Murillo shopping area and sells his products in the same place.  He is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  The support of this loan will help him financially, to cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his business such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to continue working and to have money for when his grandmother becomes sick.

Christian likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Guillermo Joel

texts.es:
Guillermo Joel  A. S. tiene 24 años, es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos, tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Guillermo Joel  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Guillermo Joel A. S. is 24 years old, married, and living with his wife and two children in the Cantón Ventanas administrative division of Los Ríos, Ecuador.

The members of the 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank live in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton. They work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Guillermo Joel is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his supplies in the Murillo commercial center and sells his products in the same location.  He is requesting this loan to be able to plant corn and rice and to buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  This loan would provide him the financial support he needs to face challenges such as pests, diseases and changing weather.  

Guillermo Joel dreams of owning his own home.  He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers for growing crops

loans.name: María Ana

texts.es:
La Señora. María Z. es socia del banco comunal Tocte, vive en la comunidad que lleva el mismo nombre y  pertenece a la parroquia de Jadan, su gente se dedica  a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en artesanías, cuenta con hermosos paisajes, su gente es amable y cordial.

Doña María tiene 38 años, está casada y tiene 3 hijos de 13, 7 y 5 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en el colegio y su segundo hijo en una escuelita del sector. Su esposo labora en la construcción como albañil y con el sacrificio conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
La Señora. María se dedica a la agricultura,  siembra hortalizas y verduras las que vende y también son para su consumo. Cría animales como: cuyes, pollos y chanchos, los que vende en su propia comunidad.
 
Se encuentra en su sexto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes. Su meta es ampliar su casa para tener un cuarto para cada uno de sus hijos.
texts.en:
María Z. is a member of the community bank of Tocte, and lives in a town of the same name in the parish of Jadan.  Most residents of the region raise farm animals or work in agriculture or artisanry.  The town has lovely landscapes and local people are amiable and courteous.

Maria is 38, married and has three children aged 13, 7 and 5; her first daughter and her second son study nearby. Her husband is a construction worker and through his own effort built the family's home.  Maria works in agriculture, planting vegetables for household consumption and sale. She also raises farm animals such as: cuyes (guinea pigs), chickens and pigs, which she sells in her community.   This is the sixth loan that Maria has requested, and she plans to use the credit to buy additional farm animals.  Among her goals is to expand her family's home to assure that her children have their own rooms.

loans.use: to buy domestic animals

loans.name: Rosa Alicia

texts.es:
Rosa Alicia tiene 40 años, vive con el compañero y los dos hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Rosa Alicia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Rosa Alicia is 40 years old.  She lives with her partner and two children.

The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Rosa Alicia is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in the Murillo shopping area and sells her products in the same place.  She is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops.  The support of this loan will help her financially to cover her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to own her own home.

Rosa Alicia enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena tiene 44 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Viven en casa propia en Morropon, una ciudad en el departamento de Piura, a más de 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, el capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace 4 años, Elena tiene un Bar – Picantería, un establecimiento donde vende comida, piqueos y bebidas como cerveza, chicha y gaseosas. El negocio se encuentra en su propio domicilio. Elena es muy conocida en la región y cuenta con una clientela establecida.

Desea ampliar su negocio con su crédito y planea comprar útiles escolares para vendérselos a sus clientes durante la campaña escolar. Con esta inversión, Elena puede lograr mayores ganancias y mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia. Para realizar sus metas, Elena ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles. Elena es muy trabajadora y posee buenas referencias personales y laborales de su comunidad urbana. Ha tenido otros préstamos y ha cumplido con sus obligaciones en una manera puntual.
texts.en:
Elena is 44 years old, married, and has two children.  They live in their own home in Morropon, a city in Piura department, more than 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

For 4 years, Elena has run a bar - restaurant.  In her establishment she sells meals, snacks and drinks such as beer, 'chicha' (a traditional corn-based drink) and soda.  Her business is located in her home.  Elena is very well known in the region and she has an established customer base.

Elena would like to use her loan to expand her business.  She also plans to buy school supplies to sell to her customers during the back-to-school season.  With this investment, Elena will be able to achieve better profits and improve her family's quality of life.  In order to achieve her goals, Elena is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  Elena is very hard working and has good personal references and work references from her community.  She has had previous loans and made her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy and sell school supplies

loans.name: Maximina

texts.es:
Maximina tiene 42 años de edad y es soltera. Vive en casa propia en la parte urbana del sector Cruce Jaén – Nuevo Olmos, situado en el distrito de Olmos, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque.

Gana su vida brindando servicios de transporte de pasajeros en sus dos mototaxis, un vehículo que consiste de una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior. Desea usar el préstamo para el mantenimiento y reparación de sus vehículos. Necesita mantener sus motos en buenas condiciones para seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes. Con la ayuda de un préstamo, espera aumentar sus ingresos y usarlos para comprar otra mototaxi. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Maximina is 42 years old and single.  She lives in her own home, in the urban part of Cruce Jaén - Nuevos Olmos sector, in Olmos district, more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Maximina earns her living providing passenger transport services in her two 'mototaxis' (a vehicle that consists of a motorbike with a cabin for transporting passengers).  She would like to use her loan to have her vehicles serviced and repaired.  She needs to keep her mototaxis in good condition so that she can continue offering her customers a good service.  With the support of this loan, she hopes to increase her profits and use these profits to buy another mototaxi.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to repair her 'mototaxi'

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es: Clementina  de 35 años de edad soltera, labora para ALcaldia de Juigalpa como operario de limpieza desde hace 1 año. Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo construir el muro de retencion para la parte trasera de su casa y ademas cambiar el techo de su casa que se encuentra en mal estado y de esta manera brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Clementina, 35, is single and has been employed for the last year by Juigalpa City Hall as a Cleaning Lady.  She is asking for her first loan to build a retention wall in the rear of her house and also to replace the roof which is in poor condition thus providing her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena tiene 36 años, vive con su esposo quien se dedica a vender carbón por mayor en diferentes lugares   tienen una hija quien estudia. Ella tiene amplia experiencia en su negocio buena atención al cliente se dedica casi a tiempo completo a su tienda tiene  clientela segura por su buena atención, rapidez y extenso surtido en productos. Procura  tener surtida su tienda ya que la competencia siempre está a la orden del día.   Doña Elena asegura que el crédito anterior le ayudo a surtir, como también darle una mejor presentación a sus productos para asegurar el retorno de los mismos, ahora desea dar otro paso y expandir los servicios o seguir surtiendo con la venta de pollo y un poco de verduras. Por lo mismo desea  renovar su crédito. para la Compra de pollo y verduras.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is 36 years old and lives with her husband who sells charcoal in different places, wholesale.  They have a daughter who is studying.

Elena has a lot of experience in her business and provides good customer service.  She works almost full time in her store and has a solid customer base because of her good customer service, her speed and her extensive stock of products.  She tries to keep her store well stocked since competition is always present.  Elena says that her previous loan helped her to stock her store and allowed her to better present her products in order to ensure their return.  She would like to take a step further, expand her services and continue stocking her store, selling chicken and some vegetables.  For this reason, she is renewing her loan to buy chicken and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy chicken and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. Mariana O. es socia del banco comunal Estrellitas, vive por la parroquia de Baños, esta parroquia es conocida por sus aguas termales las que le hacen un lugar muy turístico, cuenta con una variada gastronomía, su gente es muy amable y cordial.

Doña Mariana tiene 34 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 13, 10 y 8 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio  y sus dos últimos hijos en una escuela de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

La Señora Mariana hace 16 años se dedica a la venta de limpiones de cocina, colchas y muchos artículos mas, también labora 2 veces por semana en el arreglo de una casa.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 4 años y  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería (limpiones). Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mariana O. is a member of Estrellitas community bank and lives in the village of Bath. This village is known for its thermal water that makes it a tourist spot, with its varied cuisine and its friendly and cordial people. 
Mariana is 34 years old, single mother of three children who are 13, 10 and 8 years old. The eldest is attending juniot high school while the other two are in a primary school in the city. She rents the house where she lives as she does not have her own house.
Mariana has been selling kitchen wipes, quilts and similar items for the past 16 years and she also works twice a week as house maid.   
She has been a member of the community bank for four years and she will use this new loan to purchase merchandise (wipes). Her dream is to be able to buy her own house.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen wipes

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en: Magdalena is a member of Sarita communal bank at FINCA Peru. She is 40 years old and has four children who are in school. She sells kitchenware in a local market. She also sells school supplies. She intends to use her current loan of 1,000 PEN to purchase school supplies to sell. Magdalena would like her children to continue studying and become professionals. She would also like to use her savings to buy her own house one day.

loans.use: To purchase school supplies to sell

loans.name: Balvina

texts.es:
Balvina tiene 53 años D. edad y es casada con dos hijos. Viven en casa propia en la ciudad D. Morropon en el departamento D. Piura, a más D. cuatro horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, el capital D. la región D. Lambayeque.
 
DesD. hace 4 años, Balvina tiene un Bar – Picantería, un establecimiento donD. venD. comida, piqueos y bebidas como cerveza, chicha y gaseosas. El negocio se encuentra en su propio domicilio. Balvina es muy conocida en la región y cuenta con una clientela establecida.

Balvina desea ampliar su negocio con su crédito y planea comprar más mercadería para responder a la demanda D. sus clientes. Con esta inversión, pueD. lograr mayores ganancias y mejorar la calidad D. su vida y la D. su familia. Para realizar sus metas, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles. Posee buenas referencias personales y laborales D. su comunidad urbana. Ha tenido otros préstamos y ha cumplido con sus obligaciones en una manera puntual.
texts.en:
Balvina, 53, is married and has 2 children.  The family lives in their own home in the city of Morropon in the Piura department, more than 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

Balvina has had a Bar-Snackshop for 4 years.  This is an establishment where she sells food, snacks and drinks such as beer, chicha (a traditional Peruvian beverage maD. from corn) and soft drinks.  This business is located in her home.  Balvina is very well known in the region, and has regular customers.

Balvina wants to expand her business with this loan; she plans to buy more merchandise so that she can meet the demands of her customers.  With this investment she will be able to have better earnings and a better quality of life for herself and her family.  To carry out these goals, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 Peruvian soles.  She has good personal and work references from her community.  She has taken out prior loans, and has paid them off on time.

loans.use: to buy more snacks and drinks for her store

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TERCER MILENIO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Ricardo; El socio tiene 65 años de edad, el socio  es casado; el socio tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 6 de ellos aún dependen del socio para los estudios y la alimentación; El socio tiene un pequeño restaurante llamado el Cienciano ubicado en el Jr. Mainique 360; el restaurante del socio es atendido por su esposa y sus hijos, el socio es trabajador en el área administrativa de educación en Urubamba y con todos sus ahorros puso este restaurante para que su familia trabaje y puedan tener otro ingreso extra, les ha ido muy bien y con lo que ahorran pueden comprar al por mayor los productos requeridos por la demanda de insumos, el socio desea el crédito ahora para comprar cerveza y gaseosas al por mayor, para implementar el negocio familiar y de este modo mejorar las ventas. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cervezas y gaseosas al por mayor.

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ricardo is a member of the "Tercer Milenio" (Third Millennium) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Ricardo is 65 years old, married, and has 8 children, 6 of whom still depend on him for their education and food.  Ricardo owns a small restaurant called 'El Cienciano'  which is located at 360 Jr. Mainique.  His wife and children work in the restaurant.  Ricardo works in educational administration in Urubamba.  He used all his savings to set up the restaurant so that he could provide work for his family and so that they could make some extra income.  It has done very well and, with what they save, they are able to buy the products and supplies they need wholesale.  

Ricardo is requesting this loan to invest in buying beer and soda wholesale to stock the family business.  In this way he hopes to improve sales.  He is requesting this loan to buy beer and soda wholesale.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy beer and soda wholesale

loans.name: Milca

texts.es:
Milca tiene 39 años, es soltera y tiene dos hijas a su cargo. Viven en casa con sus padres en la ciudad de Picsi, una comunidad urbana y emergente de tamaño grande. El mercado de Picsi es un mercado emergente con grandes proyecciones de desarrollo.

Desde hace más de tres años, Milca cuenta con un negocio donde vende dulces, golosinas, abarrotes, juguetes, helados y artículos varios del hogar. También brinda servicios de fotocopiado. Con el préstamo desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería para la temporada escolar como cuadernos, papelotes, mochilas, loncheras, gotas, y tintes. Esto ayudará a incrementar sus ventas significativamente ya que dará mayores variedades de servicio. Para lograr sus metas, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Milca is 39 years old and single with two children in her care.  They live in her parents' house in the city of Pisci, a sizable and growing urban community.  The market in Pisci is a growing market with large amounts of development projected.

For the last three years, Milca has run a business selling sweets, snacks, groceries, toys, ice creams, and household items.  She also offers photocopying services.  With the loan proceeds she would like to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise for the school season, such as notebooks, paper, backpacks, lunch boxes, beads, and paints. This will help increase her sales significantly as she will be offering a greater variety of services. To achieve her goals, she has decided to ask for a loan in the amount of $375 USD.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for the school season

loans.name: Mariela Getzabel

texts.es: Mariela G.: casada de 26 años de edad tiene 1 hija de 3 años, tiene negocio de venta de ropa nueva y usada tambien vende comida y tortillas, ella inicio su negocio desde que era muy pequeña ya que su mama para pode sacarlos adelante vendia comida y desde entonces le ha gustado vender, ella agradese Dios primero y a Fape por poder brindarle un credito para poder surtir su negocio, ella Solicita el credito para invertir en la compra de zapatos Anericanos ya que sus clientes han tenido mas demanda de productos,el sueño mas grande de ella a corto plazo es poner un local con su negocio de venta de zapatos Americanos, para no andar vendiendo ambulante y el sueño a largo plazo es ver a su hija con un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Mariela G., 26, is married and has a 3 year-old daughter.  She has a business selling new and used clothing, and she also sells food and tortillas.  She started in business when she was very young, since her mother, in order to provide for the family, used to sell food.  Ever since then she has enjoyed selling.  Mariela thanks God first and also FAPE for providing a loan so that she can stock her business.  She requests this loan to invest in the purchase of American shoes, since she has a lot of demand from her customers for these products.  Her biggest dream for the short run is to be able to have her own store where she can sell American shoes, so that she would not have to sell on the street.  Her dream for the long run is to see her daughter have a better future.

loans.use: to buy American shoes

loans.name: Mario Jorge

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TERCER MILENIO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Mario Jorge; El socio tiene 43 años de edad, el socio  es soltero; el socio actualmente se encuentra trabajando y administrando el restaurante de su padre llamado Cienciano, este restaurante paso a ser familiar y por lo tanto el socio y sus padres y algunas de sus hermanas trabajan por el progreso y la buena imagen de este negocio, el socio se encarga de recepcionar a los clientes y de entregarles el pedido, también él está atento a cualquier ocurrencia, inquietud o necesidad de los clientes. El socio en esta oportunidad desea el crédito para poder invertir en la implementación y ayudar a la familia con la compra de insumos, de este modo lo que genere el negocio será bien recibido por toda la familia, ellos aportan todos en el negocio ya sea comprando diferentes muebles, vajilla, insumos, de modo tal que todo lo que genere el restaurante será  para beneficio de todos los familiares. 

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Mario Jorge is a member of the 'Tercer Milenio' (Third Millennium) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Cusco department.

Mario Jorge is 43 years old, single, and currently works in and manages his father's restaurant called 'Cienciano'.  It is a family restaurant and so Mario Jorge, his parents and some of his sisters work for the progress and good image of the business.  Mario Jorge is in charge of greeting customers and delivering their orders.  He is also alert to any problems, concerns or needs the customers may have.  On this occasion, Mario Jorge would like a loan so that he can invest in stocking the business and helping his family to buy supplies.  The money the business makes will be well received by the whole family.  They all support the business, buying furniture, crockery or supplies.  All profits from the restaurant benefit the whole family.

Mario Jorge is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es:
Jose Andres tiene 56 años de edad. Vive con su esposa en una casita de adobe en el caserío Cusupe que se encuentra en el distrito de Monsefú, una zona conocida por sus festividades turísticas y religiosas. La zona se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Las principales actividades que se realizan en este caserío son la producción de flores, la artesanía y la crianza de ganado vacuno. La zona está llena de vegetación y la comunidad es muy pequeña.

El padre de Jose Andres le enseñó el arte de elaborar canastas de carrizo. El carrizo es una caña que la trae de Chongoyape y es la materia prima para la elaboración de canastas. En su casa ha improvisado un pequeño taller, que junto a su esposa elaboran semanalmente un promedio de 80 canastas. Debido a su buen trabajo los comerciantes acuden a su domicilio para comprarle casi la totalidad de su mercadería y luego venderla en los mercados de Chiclayo.

Jose Andres ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de carrizo. Su más grande sueño es tener la oportunidad y el tiempo necesario para llevar y vender él mismo su producto en los principales mercados de Chiclayo.

Jose Andres ha tenido préstamos con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual. Está muy agradecido por el apoyo que le brinda los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en:
Jose Andres is 56 years old.  He lives with his wife in a small adobe house in Cusupe village which is located in Monsefú district, an area that is known for its tourist and religious festivities.  The area is located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.  The main businesses that are carried out in this village are flower growing, handicraft production and cattle raising.  The area is full of vegetation and the community is very small.

Jose Andres' father taught him the art of making baskets from 'carrizo'.  'Carrizo' is a type of reed from Chongoyape and it is a raw material used in making baskets.  Jose Andres has improvised a small workshop in his home and, together with his wife, he makes an average of 80 baskets a week.  Owing to the good work that he does, salespeople come to his home to buy almost all his merchandise which they then sell in the markets in Chiclayo.

Jose Andres has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles to invest in buying 'carrizo'.  His biggest dream is to have the opportunity and the time to take his products to sell himself in the main markets in Chiclayo.

Jose Andres has had previous loans with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown himself to be a punctual client.  He is very grateful for the support that Kiva lenders are providing him with.

loans.use: to buy 'carrizo' to make more baskets

loans.name: María Rosa Marina

texts.es:
La Señora. María A. es socia del banco comunal Tres de Noviembre, vive en la comunidad del mismo nombre que pertenece a la parroquia de Cumbe, esta parroquia es de clima frió, tiene hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la agricultura y cría de animales, muchos han migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo.

Doña María tiene 48 años, es casada y tiene 7 hijo de 28, 25, 24, 22, 15, 13, 11 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, sus tres hijos siguientes trabajan y ayudan en la economía del hogar, sus hijos de 15 y 13 años  estudian en el colegio y su ultima hija en una escuela de la parroquia. Su esposo no se encuentra en el país a migrado en busca de mejores oportunidades, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

Doña María se dedica a hornear chanchos actividad que la realiza hace 28 años, 4 veces a la semana. También cría vacas, gallinas y cuyes lo que vende en su propia comunidad.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 8 años tiempo en el que ha hecho muy buenas amistades y los créditos le han beneficiado en su negocio, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado.  Su meta es ampliar su casa.
texts.en:
María A. is a member of the 'Tres de Noviembre' community bank.  She lives in the community of the same name which is located in Cumbe parish.  This parish has a cold climate, beautiful landscapes, and its people work in commerce, farming, and livestock raising.  Many have migrated in search of better jobs.

María is 48 years old, married, and has 7 children aged 28, 25, 24, 22, 15, 13 and 11.  Her eldest daughter is married and lives independently.  Her next three children work and help with the household expenses.  Her 15 and 13 year-old children are studying in high school and her youngest daughter studies at a local elementary school.  Her husband does not live in the country.  He migrated in search of better opportunities.  Through their joint work, they have managed to build their own home.

María's business is roasting pigs which she does four times a week.  She has been in this business for 28 years.  She also raises cows, hens and guinea pigs which she sells in her community.

María has been a member of her community bank for 8 years.  Over the years she has made some very good friendships and the loans she has received have helped her in her business.  She will invest her new loan in buying livestock.  Her goal is to extend her house.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana is a member of the communal bank "Sarita" at FINCA Peru. She is 26 years old and has a three year-old son. She sells vegetables in the Nery Garcia market in Ayacucho.  Business has been slow in January and February but is finally picking up this month. She will be using her loan of 2,000 PEN to purchase squash and limes to sell in the market. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for four years now and enjoys the educational sessions that they provide. She would like to continue saving and buy a house one day.

loans.use: to purchase squash and limes

loans.name: Amalia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Amalia tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Viven en el distrito de Patapo, una zona urbana cerca de Chiclayo, el capital de la región de Lambayeque.  Gana su vida dirigiendo una tienda donde vende abarrotes, golosinas, helados, bebidas y comidas rápidas.  Cuenta con más de un año de experiencia en este rubro.  Su tienda está ubicada en una zona estratégica en frente del parque de Patapo y, por eso, tiene una clientela constante.

Brinda productos y comidas que son muy requeridas por sus clientes. Desea incrementar su capital de trabajo ya que con el transcurrir del tiempo, la demanda se ha aumentado ostensiblemente. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles. Esta inversión le permitirá a la postre incrementar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Amalia is 35 years old, married, and has 2 children.  They live in Patapo district: an urban area near Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.  Amalia earns her living running a store where she sells groceries, candies, iced treats, drinks and fast food.  She has more than one year's experience in this field.  Her store is located in a strategic area opposite Patapo Park.  This means that she constantly has customers.

Amalia provides products and food that are very much in demand with her customers.  She would like to increase her working capital since, over time, demand has risen ostensibly.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  This investment will allow her to increase her profits and thereby improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Luisa Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señora. Luisa C. es socia del banco comunal Tres de Noviembre, vive en la comunidad del mismo nombre que  pertenece a la parroquia de Cumbe, esta parroquia es de clima frió, tiene hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la agricultura y cría de animales, muchos han migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo y porvenir de sus familias.

La Señora. Luisa tiene 26 años, vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad, esta muy emocionada ya que se encuentra embarazada de 6 meses, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su mamá con quien comparte los gastos de su hogar, su esposo labora en el duro trabajo de minero.

Doña Luisa labora como empleada privada, esta actividad la realiza hace 2 años, de domingo a domingo en turnos rotativos.

Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado para iniciar con este negocio. Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Luisa C. is a member of the Tres de Noviembre community bank.  She lives in the community of the same name which is located in Cumbe parish.  This is a cold climate parish which has beautiful landscapes.  The locals work in commerce, farming and livestock raising.  Many have migrated in search of better jobs and a better future for their families.

Luisa is 26 years old.  She lives with her partner and has a 3 year-old child.  She is very excited because she is 6 months pregnant.  She doesn't own her own home and lives with her mom.  They share the household expenses.  Luisa's husband has a hard job, working as a miner.

Luisa works as a private employee.  She has been in her job for 2 years and works from Sunday to Sunday, working daily shifts.

This is Luisa's third loan through her community bank and she will invest her money in buying livestock to start out in this business.  Her goal is to one day own her own home.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy essential food products

loans.name: Zenith

texts.es: Zenith S.  D. 58 años, Vive en el municipio D. galapa y se dedica a la venta D. comidas corrientes;  sus principales clientes son sus  vecinos, trabajadores del sector que en este primer semestre   del año, en el cual estárn realizando actividades D. construcción en   vías publicas que se encuentran en estado D. reparación; su venta es diaria y D. contado en su mayoría correspondiente a un 60%,  aunque también maneja  créditos D. recuperación semanal, su promedio D. ventas es D. 20 almuerzos diarios y también venD. mucha sopa al menudeo medida en tasas. Zenith hace jugos naturales  para acompañar las comidas que le generan otros ingresos. Ella adquirió D. su hermana la experiencia en este oficio, hace cuatro años  porque esta última  también se dedica a vender alimentos.   Zenith inició en un barrio donD. vivía anteriormente y hoy esta en el está ella sola a cargo del hogar y D. la obligación D. sus 3 hijos.   Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con el comprará insumos para la preparación D. sus comidas y  2 juegos D. mesas  con sus respectivas sillas,  porque atienD. a su clientela en su propia terraza pero cuando aumentan las   ventas, debe usar su comedor familiar; Su sueño es adecuar su restaurante   organizandolo en el patio donD. dispondrá D. unas hermosas cabañas para el deleite y reposo D. sus clientes después D. consumir las comidas.  Su negocio es D. mucho impacto para ella porque además D. genérale una utilidad  entre el 46 al 47% fortalece su autonomía que le ha permitido vivir cómodamente en su propia casa , donD. apoya los gastos rutinarios que se presentan en su familia.
texts.en: Zenith S.  is 58 and lives in the municipality of Galapa, she sells food; her main clients are neighbors, workers of the area that in this first semester of the year are doing construction work in the roads that are being repaired; she sells daily and her sales are approximately 60% cash, she gives credit repayable weekly, the average sales are 20 daily lunches, she also sells a lot of soup by the cup.  Zenith makes freshly squeezed juices in addition to food which brings her extra income.  She gained experience in the business four years ago from her sister, who also sells food.  Zenith started selling in a neighborhood where she used to live and now she is fully in charge of her home and taking care of her three children.  This is her first loan with "Foundation Mario Santo Domingo" and she will buy ingredients for food preparation as well as two table sets with chairs because she sells to her clients in her terrace, but when it gets busy she has to use her family dining room.  Her dream is to set up a restaurant in the terrace with tents for the liking and comfort of her clients to enjoy her food.  Her business has high impact in her life because it generates profit between 46%-47% which strengthens her autonomy and has allowed her to live comfortably in her own house where she covers the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food preparation and to buy two table sets with chairs

loans.name: Maria Ursula

texts.es:
Maria Ursula tiene 39 años de edad y tiene una hija menor de edad escolar. Vive en casa propia en la zona rural del distrito de Tucume en Lambayeque, Peru. No cuenta con servicios de luz y agua en su domicilio. Su comunidad es pequeña con aproximadamente 100 familias. 

Se dedica al servicio de costura y también a la crianza de aves de corral como gallinas y pavos. Cría los animales menores hasta que han alcanzado un buen tamaño y peso y luego los vende en el mercado local. Realiza estas actividades desde hace seis años en su domicilio. Aprendió las actividades de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro. Cuenta con una clientela ya establecida en la zona.

Maria Ursula desea atender a los constantes pedidos que la campaña escolar demanda. Por ello, ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar una maquina industrial de coser. También invertirá una parte de su préstamo en la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de sus aves. Con estas actividades, espera generar mayores ingresos. Maria Ursula tiene muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su comunidad. Es honesta y trabajadora. Su mayor anhelo es lograr que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Ursula is 39 years old and has a young daughter that is in school.  She lives in a house she owns in the rural district of Tucume in Lambayeque, Peru.  She doesn't have power or water services at her home.  Her community is small with approximately 100 families.   

She works providing tailoring services as well as raising birds in the pen such as chickens and turkeys.  When the birds have reached a good size and weight she sells them in the local market.  She has raised birds at home for six years, she learned to do it from her parents and has become an expert.  She has a regular customer base in the area. 

Maria Ursula wishes to fulfill the constant orders that school season brings.  For this, she has requested Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 1,500 new soles ($550) to buy an industrial sewing machine.  She will also invest part of her loan in buying feed for the birds.  With these activities she hopes to generate higher income.  Maria Ursula has very good personal and professional references in her community.  She is honest and hardworking.  Her biggest dream is to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy an industrial sewing machine as well as feed for her birds

loans.name: Dionisia

texts.en: Dionisia is 36 years old and has one son, who is in school. She is a member of the communal bank "Saritas" at FINCA Peru. She sells clothing that she brings from Lima or markets in Huancayo.  She sells the clothing in the Nery Garcia market in Ayacucho, and has had her business for three years. She will be using her loan of 2,000 PEN to buy clothing in Lima. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years now and enjoys the women's empowerment training that they provide. She would like to educate her son and have her own house one day.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es: Raúl, es natural del distrito de San Francisco, tiene 30 años de edad, es un joven muy alegre y trabajador, esta casado con Teofila de 30 años y fruto del inmenso amor que se tienen concibieron 03 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa, ubicada en el sector Colegio del distrito de San Francisco. Raúl, empezó su aventura como agricultor desde muy niño en las tierras de sus padres. Su pasión  por el agro lo llevó a adquirir sus propias tierras donde viene trabajando 11 años de manera independiente; en el cual viene cultivando  plantas de cacao y hojas de coca. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de extraer con mayor rapidez los frutos de cada producto y de esa manera logra avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su trabajo. Se siente muy comprometido con su labor; porque  gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que los frutos de sus plantas le resultan, así obteniendo buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de producto vendido; cuenta que la  estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque en estos meses abundan los insectos y las precipitaciones de las lluvias,  impidiendo el rendimiento de su trabajo y perjudicando los frutos. El crédito solicitado es para que pueda comprar más plantaciones de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará plantaciones de cacao para luego injertarlos.
texts.en:
Raúl, a native of San Francisco district, is 30 years old. He is a very happy and hard-working young man. He is married to 30 year-old Teofilia and they have three children, the fruit of their immense love. They all live together in their own house, located in the Colegio sector of San Francisco district.

Raúl got his start as a farmer in his parents' fields when he was very young. His passion for agriculture led him to acquire his own land, where he has been working independently for 11 years. He cultivates cocoa plants and coca leaves in his fields. At harvest time, he counts on the help of laborers to pick both crops with greater speed, so that he can complete the work more quickly. He feels very committed to his work, and thanks to his daily efforts, today he is able to see the fruits of his labor. He earns a good profit for each kilogram of product sold.

He explains that the winter season is not to his liking because in those months there is an abundance of insects and rain, which keep him from doing his work and can damage his crops.

The requested loan will be used to buy more cocoa plants, which he will then graft in order have good results in little time. For now he is prioritizing the purchase of new lands to expand his planting and increase his production. This is his second loan through MFP and he is prepared to make all of his repayments punctually, as he would like to be able to access more credit in the future. He is a very beloved member of his communal bank. He will use the 2,000 nuevos soles he is requesting to buy cocoa plants that he will then graft in.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants

loans.name: Los Claveles De Jojutla Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama los "Claveles de Jojutla", porque así se llama la calle donde viven las integrantes del grupo. Esta ubicado en el estado de Morelos en México. El grupo esta conformado por 12 integrantes y es la primera vez que solicitan un prestamo. Verónica García B. es la tesorera del grupo. Tiene 44 años, estudio hasta la primaria, y se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos negocio que inició hace 12 años. Solicita el préstamo para ampliar su negocio y piensa invertirlo comprando más mercancía, como: perfumes, cremas, desodorantes y cosméticos en general. Sus clientes la prefieren por ser una persona atenta, agradable y por que siempre entrega sus pedidos a tiempo. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta. Quiere este crédito para comprar mas mercancía para su negocio y con las ganancias obtenidas invertir en su negocio para ofrecer a más personas sus productos. También desea construir mejor su casa para brindarles una vida más digna a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called "Claveles de Jojutla" (the Jojutla Carnations) because that’s the name of the street where the members of the group live.  They are located in the state of Morales in Mexico.  The group is made up of 12 members and this is the first time they have applied for a loan.  

Verónica García B. is the group’s treasurer.  She is 44 years old and studied through primary school.  She is involved in the sale of cosmetics, a business she began 12 years ago.

She is applying for the loan in order to enlarge her business and is planning on investing it in the purchase of more merchandise such as perfumes, creams, deodorants, and cosmetics in general.  Her customers prefer her because she is an attentive, pleasant person and because she always delivers their orders on time.

She is very happy to be applying for the loan.  She wants to use the loan to buy more merchandise for her business and, with the earnings she obtains, invest in the business in order to offer her products to more people.  She also wants to improve her house in order to offer a more respectable life to her family.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, deodorants, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase seafood.

loans.name: Trebol De La Suerte Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama el "Trébol de la suerte" y esta ubicado en el estado de Morelos, en México. Esta comunidad se distingue por su tradicional carnaval del chinelo que se celebra cada año en semana santa. El grupo esta conformado por nueve  integrantes y es la tercera vez que solicitan un prestamo. Maely G. A. es integrante del grupo se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, negocio que inicio hace un año. Solicita el préstamo para comprar tomate, calabacitas, papa, jitomate etc. Ella tiene 21 año, estudio hasta el sexto grado de primaria, es casada y tiene una hija de 4 años de edad. Sus clientes se sienten contentas  porque siempre encuentran lo que necesitan  para cocinar. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente contenta por que podrá tener una mayor variedad de verduras en  su negocio. Ella espera  que con sus ganancias pueda  poner su  propio local, ya que el que tiene es de su cuñada y con lo que ahorre de la renta lo utilizara para la escuela de su hija ya que el próximo año estará en preescolar. Observaciones, la persona que no se ve bien se llama Clara M..
texts.en:
This group is named the “Trébol de la suerte” (The Lucky Clover) and is located in the state of Morelos in Mexico.  This community is known for their traditional Carnaval del Chinelo (a traditional dance) that is celebrated every year during Semana Santa (a week of celebrations in April).

The group is made up of nine members and this is the third time that they have requested a loan.  Maely G. A. is a member of the group who works selling fruits and vegetables in a business she started over a year ago.  She is requesting the loan to buy tomatillos, squash, potatoes, tomatoes, etc.  She is 21-years-old, studied through the sixth year of primary school, is married, and has a 4-year-old daughter.  Her customers are please because they always find what they need to cook.  She feels happy requesting this loan because she will be able to have a greater variety of vegetables in her business.  She hopes that with her earnings she will be able to get her own stall as the one that she has now is her sister-in-law’s space and with what she would save in rent she would use it for her daughter’s schooling as next year she will be in preschool.  

Note: the person who is hard to see in the photo is Clara M..

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her fruit and vegetable business.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es:
La señora Fabiola es casada tiene 23 años de edad, apenas estudio hasta el nivel de primario, tiene 2 hijos. Fabiola vive con su esposo, tienen su vivienda en la zona de sud oeste  de la provincia Cercado del departamento de Cochabamba.

La señora Fabiola y su esposo se dedican a la producción de leche cruda, para la elaboración de quesillo, para su posterior comercialización en el mercado central de la ciudad de Cochabamba.

Las condiciones en las que viven son modestas, su vivienda cuenta con los servicios básicos, su ganado lo tiene en una propiedad aledaña a su vivienda. La señora Fabiola es una señora muy dedicada a su trabajo, pues ella y su esposo (sus hijos son muy pequeños aun) se levantan muy temprano todos los días para ordeñar las vacas y su posterior transformación en quesillo. Dedicandose durante el día al cuidado de las mimas, actividad en la que participa toda la familia.

La señora Fabiola solicita el crédito para la adquisición de una acción para ingreso al modulo lechero de su zona, y de esta manera tener asegurada el mercado para la leche que produce y tener los pagos asegurados de manera quincenal, ya que la elaboración de quesillo si bien le genera ingresos diarios, esto no le permite tener un ahorro. El ideal que tiene la señora Fabiola es que sus hijos puedan estudiar teniendo una buena alimentación y una vivienda segura.
texts.en:
Fabiola is married, 23 years old, only finished elementary school and has two children.  She lives with her husband, they have a home in the southeast area of the province of Cercado in the department of Cochabamba.

The conditions in which they live are modest, her house has basic services, she has cows in a space near her home.  Fabiola is a lady dedicated to her work, she and her husband (their kids are still very young) get up early every day to milk the cows and later transform the milk into cheese. During the day they take care of the cows, activity in which the whole family participates.

Fabiola requests a loan to acquire a stock to enter the dairy cooperative of her zone, and this way guarantee a market for the milk produced and have secured biweekly payments, even though the making of cheese generates daily income for her, it doesn't allow them to have savings.  Fabiola's wish is that her children study while living eating a healthy diet and in a safe home.

loans.use: to purchase stock to enter the dairy cooperative

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is 59 years old, married, and has ten children. She prepares food at her home and then sells it at fairs in the Ayacucho area. She sells in the towns of Seccelambras on Saturdays, Alpachaca on Wednesdays, and Putacca on Thursdays. She prepares traditional local dishes such as Mondongo (a local soup), Puca Picante (a local dish of beets, potatoes and peanuts), adobo (a soup with meat and potatoes). She maintains her business so she can continue to educate her children. With her savings, she has been able to pay her medical bills.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, and other ingredients

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es: Emiliano, natural de la ciudad de Huanta, tiene 52 años de edad, es viudo hace 15 años y tiene 02 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa ubicada en la comunidad Arroyo Negro anexo del distrito de San Francisco. Para Emiliano la edad no es impedimento para seguir surgiendo y obteniendo buenos provechos; desde muy niño sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra y es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo, Emiliano es campesino cuenta 05 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de barbasco, plantas de café y hojas de coca. Viene trabajando 27 años en sus propias tierras, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta  con el apoyo de sus 02 hijos y de los jornaleros que contrata para así avanzar con mayor rapidez en la recolección de frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar, ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Menciona que la estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque en estos meses abundan los insectos y las precipitaciones de las lluvias así impidiendo el rendimiento de su trabajo y perjudicando los frutos. El crédito solicitado es para que pueda comprar más semillas de café para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. Agradece a la institución por concederle el préstamo. Con los 1500 nuevos soles solicitados, comprara semillas de café para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en: Emiliano, a native of the city of Huanta, is 52 years old.  He has been a widower for 15 years.  He has two children who live with him in his own house located in the Arroyo Negro community in the district of San Francisco.  For Emiliano, age is not an impediment to continuing to move ahead and benefit.  Since he was very small, his parents taught him to work on the farm, and he knows the hard work of the countryside.  Emiliano is a farmer; he has five hectares of barbasco plants, coffee plants, and coca leaves.  He has been working for 27 years on his own land, and during harvest time he depends on the help of his two children and day laborers with whom he contracts in order to bring in the harvest more quickly. What he likes most about his work is harvesting, since then he feels compensated for his months of hard work.  He thinks the most difficult thing is transporting his products from the farm to the city of San Francisco, where he is offered better prices for his products.  He mentions that he doesn't like winter, because during those months the insects are plentiful and the rains impede his work and damage his crops.  The loan asked for is so he can buy more coffee seeds, plant them, and benefit from his crops in less time.  But now his first priority is to buy new land to expand his cultivation and increase his production.  This is his first credit with MFP.  He feels it will help him a lot to progress with his work.  He thanks the institution for granting him the loan.  With the 1500 nuevos soles asked for, he will buy coffee seeds, plant them, and benefit from his crops in less time.

loans.use: to buy coffee seeds

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy merchandise for retail businesses.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda tiene 34 años, nacida en el distrito de Quimbiri; convive con Nerio de 33 años de edad y tienen 05 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa ubicada en la localidad de Nueva Esperanza caserío del distrito de Quimbiri. Hilda y su pareja Nerio son el sostén de su familia. Desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, Hilda es campesina y cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de café, achiote y hojas de coca; plantas originarias de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene trabajando 17 años en sus propias tierras, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de la mano de los jornaleros  para  así avanzar con mayor  rapidez con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad es no poder contar con la maquina despulpadora de café que es de utilidad para descascarar los granos del café; es por ello que acude a MFP para concederle el crédito. En adelante, desea incrementar sus sembrios con plantas de café ya que cuenta con 02 hectáreas de terreno no cultivado. Este su Primer crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad. Con los tres nuevos soles solicitados, comprará maquina despulpadora  para descarar los granos del café.
texts.en: Hilda, 34, is a native of the Peruvian district of Quimbiri.  She lives with Nerio, 33, and their 5 children in a house that they own in Nueva Esperanza, a town in Quimbiri.  Hilda and Nerio support the family.  Hilda has been a farmer--work that she learned from her parents--since she was a girl.  She owns 4 hectares of land where she grows coffee, achiote and coca, all plants native to the Rio Apurimac valley in the Peruvian Amazon.  She started working the land for herself 17 years ago.  At harvest time, she can count on the help of both her children and temporary day laborers who she needs to get her crop in quickly.  Hilda likes harvesting her crops because the harvest is her reward for many months of working hard to grow the very best crop she can.  The most difficult thing about the business, she says, is getting the crop from her fields to the market in the town of San Francisco where she can get the best price for her crop.  Her immediate problem is that she doesn't have the equipment she needs to process her coffee beans.  She is applying to MFP for a loan to buy the equipment she needs.  She has 2 hectares of uncultivated land and, in the future, she wants to plant more coffee there.  This is Hilda's first MFP loan.  She knows that she has to repay this loan on time to secure future loans.  She will use the loan to buy equipment for her coffee planting business.

loans.use: to buy equipment for processing coffee beans

loans.name: Las Entusiastas De La 3Era Etapa De La Era Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Jeremiana  tiene 3 hijas en edad escolar, es madre soltera  y  trabaja con Edaprospo desD. hace 4 meses,  Jeremiana  es integrante  del grupo “LAS ENTUSIASTAS D. LA 3ERA ETAPA D. LA ERA”, grupo conformado por 7 integrantes que le pusieron este nombre porque en el grupo todos son entusiastas y alegres. Jeremiana  trabaja desD. hace 20 años bordando pero a raíz D. que su esposo la dejo ella empezó a vender sus bordados a domicilo es asi que hoy en día brinda servicios D. bordado gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación  ha  logrado darles a sus hijas educación y  una mejor calidad D. vida. Su sueño es comprar más maquinas computarizadas para tener productos D. bordado D. primera calidad. Con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería, hilo,  agujas, telas,  para implementar su negocio . Sabemos que jeremiana  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran

DATO 
La señora felicita Salgueda  D. polo negro se encuentra  como pasiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Jeremiana has 3 school-aged daughters.  She's a single mother and has worked with Edaprospo for 4 months.  Jeremiana is a member of the LAS ENTUSIASTAS D. LA 3ERA ETAPA D. LA ERA, a group of 7 members who chose that name because they're all enthusiastic and happy-go-lucky.  Jeremiana has maD. embroidery for 20 years and she started her embroidery business after her husband left her.  She works at home and the business has paid for her daughters' schooling and provided them all with a better quality of life.  Jeremiana wants to buy computerized equipment for making higher-quality embroidery.  She is applying for a loan so that she can buy supplies--thread, needles, material--for the business and, in turn, increase her income.  We know that she will meet her goals with a lot of hard work and a little bit of help from us.

INFORMATION
Sra. Felicita Salgueda, in the black sweater, is attending as a passive member.

loans.use: to buy supplies for service business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase various types of merchandise and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es:
Jenny, de 43 años, es una mujer disciplinada y amable. Vive en su casa propia en compañía de Miguel su esposo, de 44 años y sus 3 hijos que aún son menores. Por quienes trabaja con todas sus energías.  Desde hace 3 años, ella se dedica a recorrer todas las calles de su distrito, en su afán de vender sus productos de belleza. Inicialmente le compraban solo sus familiares, pero ahora tiene clientes exclusivos que hacen que le genere buenas utilidades. Por ello, le gusta dedicarse a su negocio,  a pesar de no tener capital suficiente, ella persiste en ello, ya que está convencida que sólo así prosperará su negocio, y seguirá siendo  el gran apoyo a su esposo, que es mecánico y, de ese modo su economía sea solvente para educar a sus hijos hasta que sean profesionales. Y para lograrlo está convencida que debe seguir trabajando con mucho entusiasmo y perseverancia, por ello le urge de inmediato adquirir mas productos de belleza y, de ese modo poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio. Es el 3er crédito que tiene con MFP, y está muy contenta de pertenecer a su grupo comunal, y promete pagar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, para no defraudar a sus compañeras de grupo quienes la integraron. 
Con el crédito que solicita comprará, productos de belleza para abastecer sus pedidos pendientes.
texts.en:
Jenny, age 43, is a disciplined and friendly woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Miguel, age 44. Jenny puts all of her energy into her work so that she can provide for her three dependent children. For the past three years, she has traveled through the streets of her district selling beauty products. Initially she bought these products for her relatives, but now she has exclusive clients that help her generate good profits. Jenny enjoys working in her business even though she lacks sufficient capital. She remains persistent since she is convinced this is the only way for her to prosper in her business. Jenny continues with the support of her husband, who works as a mechanic. Her income is used to pay for the education of her children, who want to become professionals, so she continues to work with great enthusiasm and perseverance. For this reason, Jenny has an immediate need to acquire more beauty products so that she can gradually expand her business.

This is her third loan with MFP. She is happy to be a member of her Communal Bank and promises to complete her payments on time because she does not want to disappoint the rest of her group. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy beauty products to fulfill her outstanding orders.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Zoila Natalia

texts.es:
Zoila de 43 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Trabaja desde las 06h00am hasta las 21h00pm vendiendo víveres y abastos. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso sigue trabajando para darle una buena vida a sus 6 hijos ya que está separada de su esposo. Vende en su tienda, lácteos, bebidas, arroz, dulces etc.  Para seguir trabajando y continuar con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo materiales de construcción para su vivienda como cemento, bloques.
texts.en:
Zoila, age 43, is a hardworking woman who has a small store in the front part of her house. She works from 6am to 9pm, selling food and supplies.

Zoila has many aspirations for her business, so she continues to work hard in order to provide a good life for her six children. She is separated from her husband. Zoila sells dairy products, beverages, rice, sweets, and other products from her store. To continue working in her business, Zoila wants to use this loan to buy construction materials for her home such as cement and blocks.

loans.use: To purchase cement and blocks for her home.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is 35 years old and has three children, ages 16, 9, and 7. She is a member of the communal bank "Totorilla" and has been with FINCA Peru on and off for many years where she has felt extremely supported. She has learned a lot about saving money and how to wisely invest money. 

Miriam and her partner run a small outdoor event center where they sell typical Peruvian dishes, such as guinea pig, chicharron (pork slowly cooked in pork fat) and puca picante (potatoes covered in a spicy beet-peanut sauce). She is asking for a loan of 3,000 PEN to purchase more tables, chairs, pots and silverware for this business. 

Miriam also has a seafood restaurant, La Caleta de Pescador, that she runs with her partner.

loans.use: Purchase of tables, chairs, pots, silverware for event center

loans.name: Herminio

texts.es: Herminio, de 47 años, es un hombre dedicado al cuidado de su familia. Que lo conforman su esposa Juana, y sus 6 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Palca. Desde que cumplió 19 años, esté exitoso hombre se dedicó a la agricultura. Desde ese entonces comenzó a sembrar papa, maíz y arveja en sus terrenos agrícolas que tiene en la parte alta de su localidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver concretado su esfuerzo en cada cosecha que realiza, pues recibe buen pago en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Según menciona su principal dificultad es el dinero que invierte en los estudios de sus hijos. Por eso necesita capital de trabajo para poder sembrar sin mayores dificultades, ahora está pensando sembrar después de la cosecha, arveja en gran cantidad. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Palqueños en acción”, y este es tercer crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollado por el progreso que alcanzó en su trabajo. Herminio, cosechará papa de la variedad yungay; por ello con el crédito está pensando comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico los cuales esparcirá entre sus cultivos para que le brinden un buen producto.
texts.en:
Herminio is a 47 year old gentleman who is devoted to taking care of his family. He and his wife Juana have six children, but only two live with them in their home in the town of Palca. After he turned 19, this successful man decided to become a farmer. Herminio began growing corn, potatoes, and peas on the farmland he owns in the upper district of his community. What he enjoys most about his work is seeing his efforts materialize at the end of each harvest since he is paid well at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. According to Herminio, his main difficulty is investing his money in his children’s education. For this reason, he needs operating capital to plant his crops without major difficulty. Now he will begin planting after this harvest in which he produced peas in great quantity.

Herminio is a member of the Communal Bank “Plaqueños en Acción”. This is his third loan with MFP. He feels that he has developed and progressed in what he has accomplished through his work. Herminio will be harvesting potatoes of the “Yungay” variety. For this reason, he plans to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to apply on his crops so that he can achieve a good product.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Leonilda

texts.en:
Leonilda is 43 and has been with her partner for 19 years. They have two girls, ages 16 and 6. She has a small food stand near a stadium in her town in the Ayacucho region. Leonilda says she loves being a member of FINCA Peru and can’t imagine her life without it. She is fortunate that FINCA Peru supports woman who live in rural areas, such as she does, who wouldn’t otherwise have access to loans. She has learned to be responsible and punctual, two skills which she feels have greatly helped her improve her business and personal life. 

Her dream right now is for her oldest daughter to get accepted to college. Leonilda feels strongly that her children should be able to become professionals, so that they have more opportunities than she ever did.  Leonilda is asking for a loan of 450 PEN to enroll her oldest daughter in a college prep course.

loans.use: to provide a college preparation course for her daughter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase ten sacks of potato seeds.

loans.name: Shella May

texts.en:
Shella May M. is from the village of Nicdao, Baungon, Bukidnon. She is 36 years old. Shella May is married and has 1 school-aged child. To make a living, Shella May owns & operates a business venture buying and selling firewood, electronics of several networks,  and gasoline in one liter containers in the local community. Shella May has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 11000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Shella May joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Shella May has successfully repaid a previous loan of 8000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to purchase additional inventory & working capital. Shella May is requesting a new loan of 7000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional firewood and gasoline to sell. This loan will be the 3rd loan taken out by Shella May from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional firewood & gasoline to sell

Noralyn has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 10000 PHP a month for these activities.

To make a living, Kim owns and operates a business venture in the retail sector operating a specialized retail store. loans.name: Monh

texts.en: Monh C., 22, has been married to Chun Bunran, 31, for years and has a child who is still young and attends school. Monh C.’s family lives along the river. She earns a living by selling fish caught by her husband. Recently, the quantity of fish caught has declined due to the lack of fishing gear. Some of their tools were ruined. As a result, Monh C. has requested a loan. She will use the funds to purchase a new fishing machine that will connect fish nets with boats.

loans.use: to purchase a new fishing machine that will connect fish nets with boats.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina T. is from the village of Poblacion in Damulog, Bukidnon. She is 63 years old. Carolina is married and has four adult children. She owns and operates a business venture offering vehicle repair and welding services to the local community. Her husband works as the repairman. Caroline also makes and sells sausage, or chorizzo. She has been engaged in her business for over 13 years and earns approximately 8,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month for these activities.

In 2010, Carolina joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Carolina has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to purchase materials that were needed to expand her business. Carolina is requesting a new loan of 13,000 PHP which will be used to purchase tools needed for her business and for working capital. This loan will be the fourth loan taken out by Carolina from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.
